description.value:
Poison

Aura 1

While Vestapalk is bloodied, any enemy that ends its turn in the aura takes 10 poison damage.
Whenever Vestapalk ends his turn, any dazing, stunning, or dominating effect on him ends.

Vestapalk can use a free action to fly up to his speed on an initiative of 10 + his initiative check. During the movement, Vestapalk gains a +4 bonus to all defenses against opportunity attacks and can use bite or claw once at any point during the move. If Vestapalk cannot use a free action to make this attack due to a dominating or stunning effect, then that effect ends instead of Vestapalk making the attack.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ poison

Standard

Attack: Melee 2 (one creature)

+18 vs. AC

Hit: 2d10 + 5 damage, and ongoing 5 poison damage (save ends).

Miss: Half damage.

At-Will

Standard

Attack: Melee 2 (one or two creatures)

+18 vs. ACIf Vestapalk targets only one creature, he can make this attack against it twice.

Hit: 3d10 + 5 damage, and Vestapalk can shift up to 2 squares.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ poison

Standard

Attack: Close blast 5 (creatures in the blast)

+16 vs. Fortitude

Hit: 2d10 + 5 poison damage, and the target is slowed and takes ongoing 10 poison damage (save ends both).

Miss: Half damage, and ongoing 5 poison damage (save ends).

Recharge when first bloodied ✦ psychic

Standard

Attack: Close burst 2 (creatures in the burst)

+16 vs. Will

Hit: 3d12 + 5 psychic damage, and Vestapalk pushes the target up to a number of squares equal to the target's speed.

Miss: Half damage.

Effect: Vestapalk can shift up to his speed.

At-Will ✦ charm

Minor

Attack: Close blast 10 (one creature in the blast)

+16 vs. Will

Hit: Vestapalk slides the target up to 3 squares.

At-Will

Triggered

Trigger: An enemy adjacent to Vestapalk ends its turn without moving.

Attack (Immediate Reaction): Melee 1 (the triggering enemy)

+16 vs. Reflex

Hit: 3d8 + 7 damage, and the target falls prone.

Encounter

Triggered

Trigger: Vestapalk is first bloodied.

Effect (Free Action): Breath weapon recharges, and Vestapalk uses it.

system.biography:
HP 524; Bloodied 262
Resist 15 poison 		Init +14 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 27Fort 25Ref 26Will 23
Speed 10 (forest walk), fly 14
Ability ScoresStr 20 (+11)
Con 19 (+10)		Dex 22 (+12)
Int 16 (+9)		Wis 15 (+8)
Cha 16 (+9)
Languages Common, Draconic
Alignment Evil
Skills Bluff +14, Insight +13, Stealth +17Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 18 | Insight 23
